description: Returns details about a specific monitor. This action requires the monitorName parameter. Run ListMonitors to get a list of monitor names.

parameters.name: monitorName
parameters.description: The name of the monitor that details are returned for.

nested_items.name: monitorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the selected monitor.

nested_items.name: monitorName
nested_items.description: The name of the monitor.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: Lists the status of the state of each monitor.

nested_items.name: aggregationPeriod
nested_items.description: The aggregation period for the specified monitor.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: probes
nested_items.description: The details about each probe associated with that monitor.

nested_items.name: probeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the probe.

nested_items.name: probeArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the probe.

nested_items.name: sourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the probe source subnet.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The destination for the probe. This should be either an IPV4 or IPV6.

nested_items.name: destinationPort
nested_items.description: The destination port for the probe. This is required only if the protocol is TCP and must be a number between 1 and 65536.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The network protocol for the destination. This can be either TCP or ICMP. If the protocol is TCP, then port is also required.

nested_items.name: packetSize
nested_items.description: The size of the packets traveling between the source and destination. This must be a number between 56 and.

nested_items.name: addressFamily
nested_items.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address for the probe.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the source VPC subnet.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the probe.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time and date the probe was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time and date that the probe was last modified.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time and date when the monitor was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time and date when the monitor was last modified.
